CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 25, 1939, pg. 7, reads: "Eileen Ten Years Old...Celebrates - Pretty little Eileen McPherson, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Emanuel McPherson, celebrated her tenth birthday last Thursday with a party at her home, 1418 Wylie avenue. Twenty of her little friends were present and fun was the main thing with plenty of ice cream, candy, cake and good things thrown in.  in picture, standing left to right, Martin Broadus, Ruth Grandison, Frank Harris, Dolores Bryant, Sam Durant, Margaret Early, Robert Bates, Marian Caldwell, Fatima Saylo.  Sitting, left to right, Henrietta Howard, Margaret Ellen Cannon, James Edmonds, Eileen McPherson [McPhierson], the honoree; Donald Humphrey, Doris Mae Middleton, Mary Lou Streeter and Esther Dunn. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, standing from left: Martin Broadus, Ruth Grandison, Frank Harris, Dolores Bryant, Sam Durant, Margaret Early, Robert Bates, Marian Caldwell, Fatima Saylo; seated: Henrietta Howard, Margaret Ellen Cannon, James Edmonds, Eileen McPhierson, Donald Humphrey, Doris Mae Middleton, Mary Lou Streeter and Esther Dunn, gathered for McPhierson's tenth birthday party, in her home at 1418 Wylie Avenue, Hill District
